description: Unique identifier for the specific link between a repair group and a repair component.
References the group of related repair jobs this component belongs to; links to the repair groups master.
References the standard component or operation included in the group; links to the repair component catalog.
Optional reference to the asset warranty type affecting this association; likely used to vary components by coverage; confirm with SME.
Flag indicating the association is inactive/obsolete and should not be used for new work.
